//======================= About page: UPS has partnered up with Magento to offer a free UPS Shipping and UPS Access Point™ Module that will allow you to integrate and offer a wide range of UPS shipping & delivery solutions directly on your website check-out process! This official UPS Module for Magento gives your customers access to our expansive UPS Access Point network and delivery services.
//=================== Am dudalen: Mae UPS wedi partneru â Magento i gynnig Modiwl Llongau UPS a Phwynt Mynediad ™ UPS am ddim a fydd yn caniatáu ichi integreiddio a chynnig ystod eang o atebion cludo a dosbarthu UPS yn uniongyrchol ar broses wirio eich gwefan! Mae'r Modiwl UPS swyddogol hwn ar gyfer Magento yn rhoi mynediad i'ch cwsmeriaid i'n rhwydwaith Pwynt Mynediad UPS eang a gwasanaethau dosbarthu.

//======================= About page: Simple & easy map interface for your customers to select UPS Access Point as per their preference.
//=================== Am dudalen: Rhyngwyneb map syml a hawdd i'ch cwsmeriaid ddewis Pwynt Mynediad UPS yn unol â'u dewis.

//======================= About page: User-friendly interface for your customers to switch from Access Point delivery to home delivery.
//=================== Am dudalen: Rhyngwyneb hawdd ei ddefnyddio i'ch cwsmeriaid newid o ddosbarthu Pwynt Mynediad i ddanfoniad cartref.

//======================= About page: Real time UPS shipping rate or flat rates for each available service (as per merchant’s back office settings).
//=================== Am dudalen: Cyfradd cludo UPS amser real neu gyfraddau gwastad ar gyfer pob gwasanaeth sydd ar gael (yn unol â gosodiadau swyddfa gefn y masnachwr).

//======================= About page: Range of options to set up delivery rates that your customers will see (for example: free shipping, real time shipping rates, or flat rates as per basket value thresholds).
//=================== Am dudalen: Ystod o opsiynau i sefydlu cyfraddau dosbarthu y bydd eich cwsmeriaid yn eu gweld (er enghraifft: llongau am ddim, cyfraddau cludo amser real, neu gyfraddau gwastad yn unol â throthwyon gwerth basged).

//======================= About page: Possibility to open a UPS account directly in the module itself, if you do not have one.
//=================== Am dudalen: Posibilrwydd i agor cyfrif UPS yn uniongyrchol yn y modiwl ei hun, os nad oes gennych un.

//======================= About page: Ability to export open orders so that you can process them in other applications for more complex needs.
//=================== Am dudalen: Y gallu i allforio archebion agored fel y gallwch eu prosesu mewn cymwysiadau eraill ar gyfer anghenion mwy cymhleth.

//======================= About page: Module version number and release date
//=================== Am dudalen: Rhif fersiwn y modiwl a dyddiad rhyddhau
Am ragor o wybodaeth ewch i https://www.ups .com/% 1/%2/services/technology-integration/ecommerce-plugins.page

//======================= About page: Reference name that will be associate with an account. For example warehouse 1, warehouse 2,  Store 1, Store 2 etc. You can freely chose the name as per your requirement

//======================= About page: The name associated with your UPS account. It can be found on the top on each page of your UPS invoice under 'Purchaser'

//======================= About page: A unique 12 digit number assigned by UPS to an invoice. It can be found on the top left side on each page of your UPS invoice

//=================== Am dudalen: Cyfanswm sy'n ddyledus ar gyfer yr anfoneb a roddwyd. Mae i'w weld ar y tabl 'Crynodeb o Daliadau' ar dudalen gyntaf yr anfoneb

//======================= About page: Date of issuing the invoice. It can be found on the top left side on each page of your UPS invoice

//======================= About page: Some of the data you entered is not valid. Please check again.

Nid yw e-bost yn fformat cywir

//======================= About page: Please update the city and postal code values with one of these selections and click Get Started
//=================== Am dudalen: Diweddarwch y gwerthoedd dinas a chod post gydag un o'r dewisiadau hyn a chliciwch ar Dechrau Arni

//=================== Am dudalen: Rhowch y cyfeiriad sydd ynghlwm wrth rif eich cyfrif

//=================== Am dudalen: Bydd y cyfrif hwn yn cael ei ddileu. Cliciwch Iawn i gadarnhau, caewch yr ymgom i ganslo.

//======================= About page: Your UPS account has been successfull registered
//=================== Am dudalen: Mae'ch cyfrif UPS wedi'i gofrestru'n llwyddiannus

//======================= About page: Select the UPS services you want to be visible in the checkout for your e-shoppers. To learn more about UPS services, refer UPS Tariff/Terms and Conditions of Service on UPS.COM
//=================== Am dudalen: Dewiswch y gwasanaethau UPS rydych chi am eu gweld yn y ddesg dalu ar gyfer eich e-siopwyr. I ddysgu mwy am wasanaethau UPS, cyfeiriwch Tariff UPS / Telerau ac Amodau Gwasanaeth ar UPS.COM

//======================= About page: Deliver to UPS Access Point™ (to-AP delivery)
//=================== Am dudalen: Cludo i leoliad Pwynt Mynediad UPS™ (dosbarthiad i AP)

//======================= About page: UPS delivers the parcel to a UPS Access Point™ that the customer selected, then customer picks up their order there
//=================== Am dudalen: Mae UPS yn danfon y parsel i leoliad Pwynt Mynediad UPS™ a ddewisir gan y cwsmer iddynt ei gasglu yn ôl ei gyfleustra

//======================= About page: Select the shipping services for your customers to choose
//=================== Am dudalen: Dewiswch y gwasanaethau cludo i'ch cwsmeriaid eu dewis

//======================= About page: International shipping only - visible, when shipping address is outside of EU
//=================== Am dudalen: Llongau rhyngwladol yn unig - yn weladwy, pan fo'r cyfeiriad cludo y tu allan i'r UE

//======================= About page: Number of Access Points visible to customers:
//=================== Am dudalen: Nifer y lleoliadau sy'n weladwy i gwsmeriaid:

//======================= About page: Display all the Access Points in range of:
//=================== Am dudalen: Arddangos yr holl leoliadau mewn ystod o:
Milltiroedd o gwmpas cyfeiriad dethol y traddodai

//======================= About page: Choose Account Number for this option
//=================== Am dudalen: Dewiswch Rhif Cyfrif ar gyfer yr opsiwn hwn
Dosbarthu i gyfeiriad y traddodai (dosbarthiad i gyfeiriad)

//======================= About page: UPS delivers the parcel to the shipping address provided by customer.
//=================== Am dudalen: Mae UPS yn danfon y parsel i'r cyfeiriad cludo a ddarperir gan y cwsmer.

//======================= About page: The cut off time selected here will be used in calculating the schedule delivery date and time, which will be displayed on your website checkout.
//=================== Am dudalen: Bydd yr amser terfyn a ddewisir yma yn cael ei ddefnyddio i gyfrifo dyddiad ac amser dosbarthu'r amserlen, a fydd yn cael ei arddangos ar ddesg dalu eich gwefan.

//======================= About page: For example, if the cut off time is selected as 5 PM and your e-shoppers views your webstore at 5.01 PM, all UPS scheduled delivery dates and time will be calculated from the following business day. When deciding this cut off time, please ensure that you have sufficient time to fulfill the order before the UPS scheduled pick up or you are able to drop off the packages at a UPS Access Point™.
//=================== Am dudalen: Er enghraifft, os dewisir yr amser cau fel 5 PM a bod eich e-siopwyr yn gweld eich siop we am 5:01 PM, bydd yr holl ddyddiadau ac amser dosbarthu a drefnwyd gan UPS yn cael eu cyfrifo o'r diwrnod busnes canlynol. Wrth benderfynu ar yr amser terfyn hwn, sicrhewch fod gennych ddigon o amser i gyflawni'r archeb cyn y codiad a drefnwyd gan UPS neu gallwch ollwng y pecynnau mewn lleoliad Pwynt Mynediad UPS™.

//======================= About page: If you are unsure about fulfilling customer orders on the same day, you can select 'Disable' which will result in the e-shopper seeing a generic delivery schedule for each available UPS service. For Example; 'UPS® Standard - In most cases, delivered within 1 to 3 business days in Europe.'
//=================== Am dudalen: Os ydych yn ansicr ynghylch llenwi archebion cwsmeriaid ar yr un diwrnod, gallwch ddewis 'Analluogi' a fydd yn golygu y bydd yr e-siopwr yn gweld dyddiadau dosbarthu bras ar gyfer pob gwasanaeth sydd ar gael.

//======================= About page: Please select at least one shipping service.
//=================== Am dudalen: Dewiswch o leiaf un gwasanaeth cludo.

//======================= About page: You have the official Magento COD module enabled!
//=================== Am dudalen: Mae gennych y modiwl COD Magento swyddogol wedi'i alluogi!

//======================= About page: Only show Access Points supporting COD shipments?
//=================== Am dudalen: Dim ond yn dangos Pwyntiau Mynediad sy'n cefnogi llwythi COD?

//======================= About page: Select 'YES' if you plan to offer COD shipments to a UPS Access Point™
//=================== Am dudalen: Dewiswch 'YDW' os ydych chi'n bwriadu cynnig llwythi COD i Bwynt Mynediad UPS™

//======================= About page: The COD Shipping service of this plug-in is automatically compatible with the official Collect on Delivery (COD) module by Magento.
//=================== Am dudalen: Mae gwasanaeth COD Shipping yr ategyn hwn yn gydnaws yn awtomatig â modiwl swyddogol Collect on Delivery (COD) gan Magento.

//======================= About page: You do not have the official Magento COD module installed and/or enabled!
//=================== Am dudalen: Nid oes gennych y modiwl COD Magento swyddogol wedi'i osod a/neu ei alluogi!

//======================= About page: The COD Shipping service of this plugin is automatically compatible with the official Cash on Delivery (COD) module by Magento.
//=================== Am dudalen: Mae gwasanaeth COD Shipping yr ategyn hwn yn gydnaws yn awtomatig â'r modiwl Arian Parod Wrth Gyflenwi (COD) swyddogol gan Magento.

//======================= About page: If you want the UPS Shipping module to automatically detect COD shipments, please make sure that you have installed Magento's Collect on Delivery (COD). If you already have Magento's Collect on Delivery (COD) module installed, please make sure that the module is enabled. [Click here] for detailed guidance.
//=================== Am dudalen: Os ydych chi am i'r modiwl Llongau UPS ganfod llwythi COD yn awtomatig, gwnewch yn siŵr eich bod wedi gosod Magento's Collect on Delivery (COD). Os oes gennych fodiwl Collect on Delivery (COD) Magento eisoes wedi'i osod, gwnewch yn siŵr bod y modiwl wedi'i alluogi. [Cliciwch yma] am arweiniad manwl.

//======================= About page: Please enter weight and dimensions of your packaging here. You can add multiple package dimensions, which can be easily selected in a dropdown option when creating shipments in the plug-in.
//=================== Am dudalen: Nodwch bwysau a dimensiynau eich deunydd pacio yma. Gallwch ychwanegu dimensiynau pecyn lluosog, y gellir eu dewis yn hawdd mewn opsiwn cwymplen wrth greu llwythi yn y plug-in.

//======================= About page: In case you decide to show the real time UPS shipping rate (to be configured in the next screen) to the e-shoppers, the plug-in will use the first package, referred to as the 'Default Package' that is displayed below. The Default Package's weight and dimensions will be used to calculate the UPS shipping rates that will be displayed to the e-shoppers.
//=================== Am dudalen: Rhag ofn y byddwch yn penderfynu dangos y gyfradd cludo UPS amser real (i'w ffurfweddu yn y sgrin nesaf) i'r e-siopwyr, bydd yr ategyn yn defnyddio'r pecyn cyntaf, y cyfeirir ato fel y 'Pecyn Diofyn' a ddangosir isod. Bydd pwysau a dimensiynau'r Pecyn Diofyn yn cael eu defnyddio i gyfrifo'r cyfraddau cludo UPS a fydd yn cael eu harddangos i'r e-siopwyr.

//======================= About page: Example: Standard, Large, Phone box, etc.
//=================== Am dudalen: Enghraifft: Safonol, Mawr, Blwch Ffôn, ac ati.

//======================= About page: You are going to remove this default package from your profile. Click Ok to confirm, close the dialog to cancel.
//=================== Am dudalen: Rydych chi'n mynd i dynnu'r pecyn rhagosodedig hwn o'ch proffil. Cliciwch Iawn i gadarnhau, caewch yr ymgom i ganslo.

//======================= About page: Please input at least one default package to continue.
//=================== Am dudalen: Rhowch o leiaf un pecyn rhagosodedig i barhau.

//======================= About page: Basic (number of items in the e-shopper order determine the package size)
//=================== Am dudalen: Sylfaenol (mae nifer yr eitemau yn yr archeb e-siopwr yn pennu maint y pecyn)

//======================= About page: Advanced (weights and dimensions of products in the e-shopper order determine the package size)
//=================== Am dudalen: Uwch (pwysau a dimensiynau cynhyrchion yn y drefn e-siopwr sy'n pennu maint y pecyn)

//======================= About page: Note: the plugin will create a custom package size if an e-shopper order is larger than the packages you enter
//=================== Am dudalen: Sylwch: bydd yr ategyn yn creu maint pecyn wedi'i deilwra os yw archeb e-siopwr yn fwy na'r pecynnau rydych chi'n eu nodi

//======================= About page: Warning! To use this option you must enter product weights in the product settings of your shop.
//=================== Am dudalen: Rhybudd! I ddefnyddio'r opsiwn hwn rhaid i chi nodi pwysau cynnyrch yng ngosodiadau cynnyrch eich siop.

//======================= About page: If set to “No”, rates will be based on product weights only.  If set to “Yes”, product dimensions must be entered in the product settings of your shop
//=================== Am dudalen: Os cânt eu gosod i “Na”, bydd y cyfraddau'n seiliedig ar bwysau'r cynnyrch yn unig.  Os caiff ei osod i “Ie”, rhaid nodi dimensiynau cynnyrch yng ngosodiadau cynnyrch eich siop

//======================= About page: Backup rate will only display to e-shoppers if there is an issue within product settings, such as weights missing or if weights/dimensions exceed UPS limits
//=================== Am dudalen: Bydd y Gyfradd Wrth Gefn yn cael ei harddangos i e-siopwyr dim ond os oes problem o fewn gosodiadau cynnyrch, megis pwysau ar goll neu os yw pwysau / dimensiynau yn fwy na therfynau UPS.

//======================= About page: Add default packages if you would like the package size used for rating to change based on the number of items in the e-shopper’s order
//=================== Am dudalen: Ychwanegwch becynnau rhagosodedig os hoffech i faint y pecyn a ddefnyddir ar gyfer graddio newid yn seiliedig ar nifer yr eitemau yn archeb yr e-siopwr

//======================= About page: Note: if the number of items in the e-shopper order do not match any of your entries, then the size of the package used for rating will be based on that of the highest item count exceeded by the e-shopper order.
//=================== Am dudalen: Sylwch: os nad yw nifer yr eitemau yn yr archeb e-siopwr yn cyfateb i unrhyw un o'ch cofnodion, yna bydd maint y pecyn a ddefnyddir ar gyfer graddio yn seiliedig ar y nifer uchaf o eitemau y mae'r archeb e-siopwr yn mynd y tu hwnt iddo.
Cludo i leoliad Pwynt Mynediad UPS™

//======================= About page: The e-shopper will see the % of real time UPS rates. These rates are calculated using the default package weight and dimensions that you configured in the previous screen (Package Dimensions).
//=================== Am dudalen: Bydd yr e-siopwr yn gweld % cyfraddau amser real UPS. Mae'r cyfraddau hyn yn cael eu cyfrifo gan ddefnyddio'r pwysau pecyn rhagosodedig a dimensiynau y gwnaethoch chi eu ffurfweddu yn y sgrin flaenorol (Dimensiynau Pecyn).

//======================= About page: The minimum thresholds can not be the same.
//=================== Am dudalen: Ni all y trothwyon lleiaf fod yr un peth.

//======================= About page: Click on the 'Complete Configuration' button to finish the configuration of the plug-in and start offering UPS shipping services on your website.
//=================== Am dudalen: Cliciwch ar y botwm 'Cyfluniad Cyflawn' i orffen cyfluniad yr ategyn a dechrau cynnig gwasanaethau cludo UPS ar eich gwefan.

//======================= About page: If you are new to UPS, please refer to the following FAQs for additional information:
//=================== Am dudalen: Os ydych chi'n newydd i UPS, cyfeiriwch at y Cwestiynau Cyffredin canlynol am wybodaeth ychwanegol:

//======================= About page:
1) How do I get more information about my new UPS shipping account?
If you opened a new UPS shipping account from the plug-in, a confirmation email with more information will be sent to the email address that you entered while creating the new account.
//=================== Am dudalen:
1) Sut mae cael mwy o wybodaeth am fy nghyfrif llongau UPS newydd?
Pe baech chi'n agor cyfrif cludo UPS newydd o'r ategyn, bydd e-bost cadarnhau gyda mwy o wybodaeth yn cael ei anfon i'r cyfeiriad e-bost y gwnaethoch chi ei nodi tra creu cyfrif newydd.

//======================= About page:
2) How do I prepare my packages for UPS collection or drop off to a UPS Access Point™?
Refer to the package preparation recommendations at this link - https://www.ups.com/%1/%2/services/individual-shipper/preparing-to-ship.page
//=================== Am dudalen:
2. Sut mae paratoi fy mhecynnau ar gyfer casglu UPS neu eu gollwng i leoliad Pwynt Mynediad UPS™?
Cyfeiriwch at yr argymhellion paratoi pecyn yn y ddolen hon - https://www.ups.com/%1/%2/services/individual-shipper/preparing -to-ship.page

//======================= About page:
3) How do I give my packages to UPS?
You can drop you packages at any authorized UPS location such as a UPS Access Point™. Click below to search for a convenient access point location near you.
//=================== Am dudalen:
3. Sut mae rhoi fy mhecynnau i UPS?
Gallwch ollwng eich pecyn mewn unrhyw leoliad UPS awdurdodedig megis lleoliad Pwynt Mynediad UPS™. Cliciwch isod i chwilio am leoliad cyfleus yn eich ardal chi

//======================= About page: You can also ask UPS to pickup packages from your warehouse or business address. If you need an occasional pickup, you can directly schedule a pickup from UPS.COM using this link - https://wwwapps.ups.com/pickup/schedule?loc=%1
//=================== Am dudalen: Gallwch hefyd ofyn i UPS godi pecynnau o'ch warws neu'ch cyfeiriad busnes. Os oes angen codiad achlysurol arnoch, gallwch drefnu sesiwn codi o UPS.COM yn uniongyrchol gan ddefnyddio'r ddolen hon - https://wwwapps.ups.com/pickup/schedule?loc=%1

//======================= About page: If you have UPS packages on most business days and would prefer a regular UPS pickup, you can email a completed and signed Pickup form to the following email address - konto@ups.com. Then a UPS representative will be in touch with you to discuss a daily UPS pickup.
//=================== Am dudalen: Os oes gennych becynnau UPS ar y rhan fwyaf o ddiwrnodau busnes ac y byddai'n well gennych chi gasglu UPS yn rheolaidd, gallwch gysylltu ag UPS trwy ffonio'r rhif ffôn a ddarperir o dan Cwestiynau Bilio yma. Yna bydd cynrychiolydd UPS yn cysylltu â chi i drafod codiad UPS bob dydd.

//======================= About page: If you have UPS packages on most business days and would prefer a regular UPS pickup, you can contact UPS by calling at the phone number provided under Billing Questions here. Then a UPS representative will be in touch with you to discuss a daily UPS pickup.

//======================= About page:
4. What steps do I need to take to set up a UPS Collect on Delivery (COD) service?
You can contact UPS by calling at the phone number provided under Billing Questions here. Then a UPS representative will be in touch with you to discuss the COD service.
//=================== Am dudalen:
4. Pa gamau sydd angen i mi eu cymryd i sefydlu gwasanaeth UPS Collect on Delivery (COD)?
Gallwch gysylltu ag UPS drwy ffonio'r rhif ffôn a ddarperir o dan Cwestiynau Bilio yma. Yna bydd cynrychiolydd UPS yn cysylltu â chi i drafod y gwasanaeth COD.

//======================= About page:
4) What steps do I need to take to set up a UPS Collect on Delivery (COD) service?
You can email a completed and signed COD form to the following email address - konto@ups.com. Then a UPS representative will be in touch with you to discuss the COD service.
//=================== Am dudalen:
4. Pa gamau sydd angen i mi eu cymryd i sefydlu gwasanaeth UPS Collect on Delivery (COD)?
Os oes gennych ddiddordeb mewn defnyddio gwasanaethau UPS Collect on Delivery (COD), cyfeiriwch at y ddolen hon am fanylion: < a href='https://www.ups.com/%1/%2/shipping/services/value-added/cod.page' target='_blank'> https://www.ups.com/%1 /%2/shipping/services/value-added/cod.page

//======================= About page: NOTICE: The UPS package tracking systems accessed via this service (the " Tracking Systems ") and tracking information obtained through this service (the " Information ") is the private property of UPS. UPS authorizes you to use the Tracking Systems solely to track shipments tendered by or for you to UPS for delivery and for no other purpose. Without limitation, you are not authorized to make the Information available on any web site or otherwise reproduce, distribute, copy, store, use or sell the Information for commercial gain without the express written consent of UPS. This is a personal service, thus your right to use the Tracking Systems or Information is non-assignable. Any access or use that is inconsistent with these terms is unauthorized and strictly prohibited.
//=================== Am dudalen: HYSBYSIAD: Eiddo preifat UPS yw'r systemau tracio pecynnau UPS y ceir mynediad iddynt drwy'r gwasanaeth hwn (y "Systemau Tracio") a gwybodaeth olrhain a geir drwy'r gwasanaeth hwn (y " Information"). Mae UPS yn eich awdurdodi i ddefnyddio'r Systemau Tracio dim ond i olrhain llwythi a dendro gennych chi neu ar eich cyfer chi i UPS i'w danfon ac nid at unrhyw ddiben arall. Heb gyfyngiad, nid ydych wedi'ch awdurdodi i sicrhau bod y Wybodaeth ar gael ar unrhyw wefan nac fel arall atgynhyrchu, dosbarthu, copïo, storio, defnyddio neu werthu'r Wybodaeth er budd masnachol heb ganiatâd ysgrifenedig penodol UPS. Mae hwn yn wasanaeth personol, felly nid oes modd neilltuo eich hawl i ddefnyddio'r Systemau Tracio neu Wybodaeth. Mae unrhyw fynediad neu ddefnydd sy'n anghyson â'r telerau hyn yn anawdurdodedig ac wedi'i wahardd yn llym.

//======================= About page: If you are new to UPS, please refer to the following FAQs for additional information:
//=================== Am dudalen: Os ydych chi'n newydd i UPS, cyfeiriwch at y Cwestiynau Cyffredin canlynol am wybodaeth ychwanegol:

//======================= About page: By installing UPS Plugin you gained this convenient option to apply UPS recommended Security Enhancements to your e-shop.By enabling particular security enhancements below you can make your e-shop less vulnerable to some common hackers' attacks.

Note, you can keep UPS recommended Security Enhancements disabled if you have already implemented these security measures in other way (by tweaking your web servers configurations properly, by coding own Magento hooks or by using some other plugin that aims to implement the similar enhancements).
//=================== Am dudalen: Trwy osod UPS Plugin fe wnaethoch chi ennill yr opsiwn cyfleus hwn i gymhwyso Gwelliannau Diogelwch a argymhellir gan UPS i'ch e-siop. Trwy alluogi gwelliannau diogelwch penodol isod gallwch chi wneud eich e-siop yn llai agored i ymosodiadau rhai hacwyr cyffredin.

//======================= About page: Note, you can keep UPS recommended Security Enhancements disabled if you have already implemented these security measures in other way (by tweaking your web servers configurations properly, by coding own Magento hooks or by using some other plugin that aims to implement the similar enhancements).

See [wikipedia|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clickjacking] for more details. If you enable this defense, then UPS plugin will secure your store by communicating framing policy to user's browser through 'X-Frame-Options: Sameorigin' HTTP response header and by injecting 'frame-breaker' java script for legacy browsers.- UPS Plugin can secure your e-shop Front Office pages in accordance with OWASP recommended Clickjacking Defense Cheat Sheet Disable this defense if you wish to enable framing of your e-shop GUI on 3rd party websites; or if you have already implemented this defense differently.
//=================== Am dudalen: Gweler [wikipedia|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clickjacking] am ragor o fanylion. Os ydych chi'n galluogi'r amddiffyniad hwn, yna bydd ategyn UPS yn sicrhau eich storfa trwy gyfathrebu'r polisi fframio i borwr y defnyddiwr trwy bennawd ymateb HTTP 'X-Frame-Options: Sameorigin' a thrwy chwistrellu sgript java 'frame-breaker' ar gyfer porwyr etifeddiaeth.- UPS Plugin yn gallu sicrhau eich tudalennau Swyddfa Flaen yr e-siop yn unol â'r Daflen Twyllo Amddiffyniad Clickjacking Defence a argymhellir gan OWASP Analluoga'r amddiffyniad hwn os ydych am alluogi fframio eich GUI e-siop ar wefannau trydydd parti; neu os ydych eisoes wedi gweithredu'r amddiffyniad hwn yn wahanol.

//======================= About page:
See wikipedia for more details.If you check this option, UPS plugin will secure your e-shop Front Office by applying
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
//=================== Am dudalen:
Gweler wikipedia am ragor o fanylion. Os byddwch yn gwirio'r opsiwn hwn, bydd ategyn UPS yn diogelu eich e-siop Swyddfa Flaen y DU trwy gymhwyso
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff

//======================= About page: HTTP Response Header to all Magento Front Office pages. That will prevent the client's browser (notably Internet Explorer) from MIME-sniffing a response away from the declared content-type. You may not really need this as your users are not supposed to upload any potentially harmful files to your e-shop (e.g. JavaScript instead of an Image). However, it is still good practice to enable this special security header as there is no performance penalty associated with it.
//=================== Am dudalen: Pennawd Ymateb HTTP i holl dudalennau Swyddfa Flaen Magento. Bydd hynny'n atal porwr y cleient (yn enwedig Internet Explorer) rhag i MIME-sniffing ymateb i ffwrdd o'r datganedig-math cynnwys. Efallai na fydd gwir angen hwn arnoch gan nad yw eich defnyddwyr i fod i uwchlwytho unrhyw ffeiliau a allai fod yn niweidiol i'ch e-siop (e.e. JavaScript yn lle Delwedd). Fodd bynnag, mae'n dal yn arfer da galluogi'r pennawd diogelwch arbennig hwn gan nad oes cosb perfformiad yn gysylltiedig ag ef.

//======================= About page: Enables cross-site scripting filters in browsers that support the X-XSS-Protection directive
//=================== Am dudalen: Yn galluogi hidlwyr sgriptio traws-safle mewn porwyr sy'n cefnogi cyfarwyddeb X-XSS-Protection

//======================= About page:
See wikipedia for more details.If you check this option, UPS plugin will secure your e-shop Front Office by applying
X-XSS-Protection: '1; mode=block'
HTTP response header to all Magento Front Office pages.
//=================== Am dudalen:
Gweler wikipedia am fwy o fanylion. Os byddwch yn gwirio'r opsiwn hwn, bydd ategyn UPS yn diogelu eich e-siop Swyddfa Flaen y DU trwy gymhwyso
X-XSS-Protection: '1; mode=bloc'
Pennawd ymateb HTTP i holl dudalennau Magento Front Office.

//======================= About page: Protect your e-shop website against protocol downgrade attacks and cookie hijacking
//=================== Am dudalen: Amddiffyn gwefan eich e-siop rhag ymosodiadau israddio protocol a herwgipio cwcis

//======================= About page:
See wikipedia for more details If you check this option, UPS plugin will secure your e-shop Front Office by applying
Strict-Transport-Security 'max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains'
HTTP response header to all Magento Front Office pages.
//=================== Am dudalen:
Gweler wikipedia am ragor o fanylion Os byddwch yn gwirio'r opsiwn hwn, bydd ategyn UPS yn diogelu Swyddfa Flaen eich e-siop trwy wneud cais
Strict-Transport-Security 'max-age=31536000; cynnwys pennawd ymateb HTTP
SubDomains i holl dudalennau Swyddfa Flaen Magento.

//======================= About page: Prevent sensitive pages from caching by browser.
//=================== Am dudalen: Atal tudalennau sensitif rhag caching gan borwr.

//======================= About page:
See OWASP FAQs for more details. If you check this option, UPS plugin will secure the Checkout process by applying
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store
Expires: 0
Pragma: no-cache
HTTP response headers to the corresponding pages
//=================== Am dudalen:
Gweler Cwestiynau Cyffredin OWASP am ragor o fanylion. Os byddwch yn gwirio'r opsiwn hwn, bydd ategyn UPS yn diogelu'r broses Desg dalu trwy gymhwyso
Rheoli Cache: dim storfa, dim storfa
Yn dod i ben: 0
Pragma: dim storfa
Penawdau ymateb HTTP i'r tudalennau cyfatebol
Ni allem ddod o hyd i unrhyw gofnodion
